OpenCSRs Probe View

Requires: NI Distributed System Manager (Windows)

Right-click OpenCSRs and select Probe from the shortcut menu to display this view. This view displays open certificate signing requests available on the Web Server. You can create new CSRs, display or delete existing CSRs, and install digitally signed certificates that correspond to an open CSR.

This view includes the following components:

  • Open Certificate Signing Requests—Displays open CSRs on the Web Server.
  • Create—Launches the Create a Certificate Signing Request dialog box.
  • Delete—Deletes the selected CSR.
  • Show—Displays the value of the selected CSR.
  • Install—Displays the text field to paste the signed certificate returned by the certificate authority (CA).

Refer to the LabVIEW Help for information about enabling SSL on the LabVIEW Web Server.
